statements: SELECT * FROM student_performance WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT course_code, course_grade FROM student_performance WHERE enrollment_year = 2021;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_year FROM student_performance WHERE course_grade = 'A';
SELECT student_name, course_grade FROM student_performance WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_grade FROM student_performance WHERE enrollment_year = 2020 ORDER BY course_grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_performance WHERE course_grade = 'A' ORDER BY enrollment_year DESC
SELECT student_name, course_code, enrollment_year FROM student_performance WHERE student_id = 1001
SELECT student_name, course_grade FROM student_performance WHERE enrollment_year > 2015 ORDER BY student_name ASC, course_grade DESC
SELECT student_name, course_code FROM student_performance WHERE course_code LIKE 'MATH%' OR course_code LIKE 'CS%' ORDER BY student_name
SELECT * FROM student_performance WHERE enrollment_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2015 ORDER BY student_id
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, class_grade FROM students WHERE class_grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, attendance_percentage FROM students WHERE attendance_percentage < 90;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_type = 'Science';
SELECT course_name, course_credit_hours FROM courses ORDER BY course_credit_hours DESC;
SELECT student_name, class_grade, attendance_percentage FROM students;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE class_grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN courses ON students.student_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, class_grade, attendance_percentage FROM students WHERE class_grade BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY attendance_percentage DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, course_type FROM students JOIN courses ON students.class_grade < 80 AND students.student_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT subject_name, subject_teacher FROM Subjects WHERE subject_credits > 3;
SELECT student_name, subject_name, overall_grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id;
SELECT student_name, student_age, subject_name, overall_grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Subjects ON Grades.subject_id = Subjects.subject_id;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Students WHERE student_grade = 'A'
SELECT subject_name, subject_teacher, subject_credits FROM Subjects WHERE subject_credits > 3

SELECT student_name, student_grade, Subjects.subject_name FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Subjects ON Grades.subject_id = Subjects.subject_id WHERE student_age > 20

SELECT student_name, subject_name, overall_grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Subjects ON Grades.subject_id = Subjects.subject_id WHERE overall_grade = 'B'

SELECT student_name, student_age, subject_teacher FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Subjects ON Grades.subject_id = Subjects.subject_id WHERE subject_teacher LIKE '%Smith%'
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM Students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, gender FROM Students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM Courses WHERE credits BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT student_name, gender FROM Students WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT student_name, grade, semester FROM Students s JOIN Grades g ON s.student_id = g.student_id WHERE semester = 'Fall';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM students ORDER BY student_age DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_credit FROM courses WHERE course_credit > 3;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students INNER JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id;
SELECT student_name, department_name FROM students INNER JOIN departments ON students.student_id = departments.department_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_age > 20 ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT student_name, student_major FROM students WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM enrollments)
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN grades g ON e.course_id = g.course_id WHERE g.grade >= 80
SELECT department_name, COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS num_students FROM departments d JOIN enrollments e ON d.department_id = e.course_id GROUP BY department_name
SELECT AVG(grade) AS avg_grade, MAX(grade) AS max_grade, MIN(grade) AS min_grade FROM grades
